# DDDevicePairingAccess

**Structure**

Specifies the access level requested for device discovery.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DDDevicePairingAccess
```

## Type Properties

- **default**: Use the system’s default access for the device selected by the user.
- **permanent**: Grant the app permanent access to the device selected by the user for future use.

items.description: Use the system’s default access for the device selected by the user.
items.name: default

items.description: Grant the app permanent access to the device selected by the user for future use.
